events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but they are faulty. The left earcup has a strange crack and sometimes the sound cuts out.
The reported issue is identified as a product defect due to broken and faulty components as described by the customer.
Customer’s case has been assigned to an agent specialized in product defects for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the crack and sound issues with your headphones. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the cracked earcup and let us know if you have tried any troubleshooting steps so far?
Here is a photo of the crack. I haven’t tried anything else besides plugging and unplugging the headphones a few times.
Thank you for the photo. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive a replacement pair of headphones instead of a refund. Thank you for the quick response.
We have processed your request for a replacement. You will receive a shipping confirmation within two business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement headphones arrived in good condition and are working properly.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and everything is perfect. Thanks for resolving this so efficiently!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance. This case is now closed.
